resources.string: A supermarket with over 23 years of experience in the food industry, committed to offering quality and savings to local customers.
Alameda Alberto J.E.M Rollo, 355 - Centro, Américo Brasiliense - SP, 14820-000
Amaluca is a store offering a wide variety of products, including stationery items, toys, gifts, kitchenware, backpacks, and handbags.
Av. Secondo Della Rovere, 539, Américo Brasiliense - SP, 14821-208
Kobauto Auto Parts and Accessories is a specialized store offering automotive parts for various makes and models, focusing on top-quality products.
Av. Secondo Della Rovere - São José, Américo Brasiliense - SP, 14821-208
Ponto do Churrasco is a restaurant that serves charcoal-grilled barbecue and homemade meals, offering executive dishes and delivery. It’s known for its quality meats and homemade seasoning.
Alameda Alberto J.E.M Rollo, 900 - Santa Terezinha, Américo Brasiliense - SP, 14820-000
Quintal do Açaí specializes in açaí and ice creams, offering options such as the “Casadinho” — a mix of açaí and cupuaçu with banana and granola.
Alameda Alberto J.E.M Rollo, 440, Américo Brasiliense - SP, 14820-000
Sempre ON is a beverage distributor that offers a variety of frozen products.
Alameda Alberto J.E.M Rollo, 745 - Santa Terezinha, Américo Brasiliense - SP, 14820-000
